comment: Pre-review complete. Document CR-012 v0.1 meets all requirements: (1) Frontmatter contains required title field; revision_summary not required for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1. (2) Document structure follows CR template with all required sections per SOP-002 Section 6: Purpose, Scope (with affected files table and out-of-scope items), Rationale, Implementation Plan, Testing Summary, and Execution table. (3) Scope clearly identifies two files to be modified with specific change descriptions. (4) Rationale properly traces to INV-002 findings and maps implementation to CAPA-002 proposals 1-4. (5) Execution items EI-1 through EI-3 are well-defined with proper table structure. Recommend proceeding to pre-approval.

## QA Post-Review: CR-012

### Checklist Verification

| Item | Status | Evidence |
|------|--------|----------|
| Frontmatter: title present | PASS | "Implement QA Review Safeguards (CAPA-002)" |
| Frontmatter: revision_summary present | PASS | "CR-012: Document execution results for QA review safeguards implementation" |
| Frontmatter: CR ID in revision_summary | PASS | Begins with "CR-012:" |
| Template compliance | PASS | CR template with sections 1-6 |
| Required sections present | PASS | Purpose, Scope, Rationale, Implementation Plan, Testing Summary, Execution |
| No placeholder content | PASS | None found |
| No typos/errors | PASS | None found |
| Formatting consistent | PASS | Consistent |

### Execution Verification

| EI | Status | Verified |
|----|--------|----------|
| EI-1 qa.md update | COMPLETE | Behavioral Directives section with 6 subsections present. Review Criteria table with evidence requirements present. |
| EI-2 qms.py update | COMPLETE | generate_review_task_content() at lines 535-655, generate_approval_task_content() at lines 658-725, cmd_route() updated at lines 1138-1167, cmd_assign() fix at line 1230. |
| EI-3 verify format | COMPLETE | Syntax verification evidence documented. |

### Post-Review Requirements (SOP-002 Section 7.3)

- Execution Complete: YES - All 3 EIs status COMPLETE
- Documentation Approved: N/A - No separate controlled documents modified
- Evidence Documented: YES - All EIs have evidence

### Findings

No findings. All execution items verified complete with evidence.

### Recommendation

RECOMMEND - CR-012 execution is complete. All implementation items verified against source files. Ready for post-approval.

CR-012-EI-3: Your evidence of completion - Verified qms.py compiles without syntax errors (`python -m py_compile .claude/qms.py` passed) - is insufficient; the fact that qms.py compiled does not address the content of the review/approval prompt injection. Independently of that, I noticed that the review task of this very review appeared in my inbox with "QA Review" in the structured review response format. I am not QA, though.
